post:
This month avail flat 15% discount on fully managed VPS servers at bodHOST. Our VPS servers are built around Cloud architecture where we use vLite platform to setup Linux VPS servers and Hyper-V 64-bit hypervisor for Windows VPS servers. All of our VPS plans provide root / RDP access so you can manage or install applications as per your requirements as well.

Use Coupon Code: “Win15” – [note: the offer is valid for limited time i.e. 31-Jan-2016]
